hero.title: Lekcije iz oblasti IT-a
hero.subtitle: Pretražite lekcije iz IT oblasti potpuno besplatno. Registrujte se i proverite vaše znanje

benefits.benefit_text_3: Da, pristup svim oblastima platforme je potpuno besplatan. Nema skrivenih troškova

questions.start_course: Da li ste sigurni da želite da pohađate ovaj kurs?

about.p1: Sa programiranjem se prvi put susreo u srednjoj školi gde je između ostalog pohađao predmete koji obuhvataju programske jezike C i C#. Takođe se u to vreme između ostalog upoznao i sa SQL Server bazama podataka kao i osnovnim konceptima razvoja veb aplikacija.
about.p2: 2016. upisuje Univerzitet Metropolitan smer Informacionih Tehnologija. Već nakon završene prve godine studija dobija stipendiju Univerziteta i biva zaposlen u razvojnom timu fakulteta kao programer.
about.p3:
Radeći u razvojnom timu univerziteta susreo se sa širokom paletom različitih tehnologija kao što su:
  • Java + Spring
  • MySQL
  • PHP + Codeigniter
  • Angular 2+
  • HTML + CSS + JS + Bootstrap
about.p4:
Učestvovao u održavanju i razvoju informacionih sistema Univerziteta a koji uključuju:
  • ISUM - Informacioni sistem Univerziteta Metropolitan
  • LAMS - Learning Activity Management System (e-learning sistem)
about.p5:
Učestvovao u izradi novih sistema koji uključuju:
  • LAMS Manager
about.p6:
Kao lead frontend developer radio na sledećim projektima:
  • Metropolitan esDnevnik - klon esdnevnika
  • Metropolitan bibliografija
  • Metropolitan projekti
  • Razvoj novog ISUM-a
about.p7:
Kao saradnik u nastavi vodio laboratorijske vežbe na predmetima:
  • IT370 - Interakcija čovek računar (2018/2019)
  • IT210 - Osnove Informacionih Sistema (2019/2020)
about.p8: Krajem 2019. prelazi u startap kompaniju Zanix gde radi kao software developer. Trenutno radi na projektima koji uključuju dominantno PHP, Laravel, Wordpress i različite vrste front end tehnologija kao što su VueJS, jQuery i Bootstrap
about.p9: Tečno govori, čita i piše Engleski jezik

hero.title: Lessons in IT
hero.subtitle: Search for your desired IT lesson totally free of charge. Sign Up and test your knowledge.

questions.start_course: Are you sure you want to start this course?

about.p1: First started programming in high school where he attended classes that evolved around programming languages like C and C#. During his high school days he also started learning about databases (SQL Server) and the basic concepts of developing web applications.
about.p2: In 2016 he started attending the Metropolitan University with a major in Information Technology. After completing the freshman year he won a scholarship and got employed at the development team of the university as a programmer.
about.p3:
While working at the university he encountered a wide variety of technologies such as:
  • Java + Spring
  • MySQL
  • PHP + Codeigniter
  • Angular 2+
  • HTML + CSS + JS + Bootstrap
about.p4:
He participated in maintenance and development of existing university Information Systems such as:
  • ISUM - Information system of Metropolitan University
  • LAMS - Learning Activity Management System (e-learning system)
about.p5:
Also, he participated in development of new systems such as:
  • LAMS Manager
about.p6:
As a lead frontend developer he worked on the following projects:
  • Metropolitan class register
  • Metropolitan bibliography
  • Metropolitan projects
  • Development of a new University information system
about.p7:
As a teaching associate he thought the following subjects:
  • IT370 - Human Computer Interaction (school year 2018/2019)
  • IT210 - Introduction to Information Systems (school year 2019/2020)
about.p8:
At the end of 2019 he got employed at a startup company Zanix where he currently works as a software developer.
He currently works on projects that evolve around PHP, Laravel, Wordpress and various types of frontend technologies like: VueJS, jQuery and Bootstrap.
